item.title: Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Steps for Small Dogs and Cats, Portable Ramp Stairs for Couch, Sofa, and High Bed Climbing, Non-Slip Balanced Indoor Step Support, Paw Safe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $89.99 - $75.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:35:49 UTC – Details)


Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the couch to give you a snuggle. But if your pet is too small or getting older they can’t always jump up and down to do it themselves. And if you’re not always around to help them or you’re getting a bit old yourself, sometimes you need a little extra help. We developed the Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs as a simple, effective way to get them up and down while putting less stress on you both. Featuring a non-slip bottom these fabric-covered stairs in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step sizes simply push right up to the edge so they can climb up or get down quickly, easily, and safely. Product Details: Pet Stairs for Couch, Bed, and Sofa; Supports Small to Medium Dogs and Cats; Heavy-Duty CertiPUR-US Certified Foam; Well-Balanced, Reliable Support for Pets; Lightweight and Portable for Whole Home Use; Soft Fabric Exterior for Paw-Friendly Support; Available in Multiple Colors to Match Home Decor; Help your small dog or aging cat get up on the couch or bed more easily with a soft, supportive foam pet stair system from Best Pet Supplies designed specifically for your four-legged friends. Get one now by clicking Add to Cart above.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 30 x 16 x 22.5 inches; 5.78 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ ST235C-L
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 12, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08L42MKC3
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam: To ensure that your pet gets the safest quality steps, we made sure that our USA sourced foams are CertiPUR-US Certified. CertiPUR-US Certified foams are manufactured without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.
Reduces Strain on Older Adults – Our versatile dog steps not only help your pets they minimize the need for you to have to pick up your animal to get them up on the furniture, which is especially important if you struggle with strength or stability
Multiple Step Size Options – Ideal for small to medium sized pets these steps for dogs and cats come in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step options, so you can use them as dog stairs for beds or pet stairs for cats who need help climbing on a sofa
Trendy Home Decor Colors – We want our dog stairs for high beds and couches to better match your living room, bedroom, or personal space which is why they’re available in 17 different colors and patterns to fit your individual style

Read more

Stability For All Ages

With an anti-slip bottom and 15 or 16 inch width, your dog or cat will climb effortlessly to their favorite spots.

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam*

Crafted from CertiPUR-US certified foams, these pet stairs are made without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.

Certificate Issued: September 25, 2018 Alliance for Flexible Polyurethane Foam/CertiPUR-US program.

Cushion Every Step

The mattress-grade foam inside cushions and supports your pet’s every step reducing stress and relieving pressure on their paws and joints.

Easy to Keep Clean

All sizes of steps come with a completely removable cover that is machine washable. All our fabrics are pleasing to the touch and the eyes. With different options to choose from, it will be easy to maintain your household’s good vibes.

Read more

Sizes Available:

– Small: 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L.

– Medium: 15″W x 18″H x 24″L.

– Large: 16″W x 22.5″H x 30″L.

Different Heights For Different Spaces

Does your dog need just a little help getting on the couch? Is your cat finding it difficult to reach his favorite window? Give them ultimate access with our 3 ranges of height.

The large is 22 1/2″ inches in height, giving your pet access to taller places within your home. The medium reaches 18″ in height, allowing for a simple climb to reach a snuggle session. The small steps are 13 1/2″ tall, for a simple boost up to a favorite window sill.

  • Our steps are easy to move around your home or take on the go for some adventures. Never worry about your pet’s accessibility anymore, with Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs!

Read more





Dark Grey with White Lattice Print
Brown Linen
Grey Corduroy
Grey Linen
Dark Brown Suede
Paws-Black Fleece

Fits Most Breeds: This dog walking harness medium was designed to fit most medium breeds of dogs. Please refer to our sizing chart and choose a larger size if your dog is between sizes. Medium: fits 16 – 17 in chest, 11 – 12 in neck.
3 Security Measures: The velcro straps allow you to wrap the harness snug without catching his fur. The buckle secures and provides quick-release, while double rings ensure leash safety at all times
Pet Supplies for Furry Friends: We are pet owners first and business owners second, making our own products and standing behind them

Waldsmuller No Pull Adjustable Dog Harness and Leash Set – Designed for Your Dog, and You. Enjoying a walk in the park with your dog obediently at your heels is a dream activity of many pet owners. ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $23.58
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:14:05 UTC – Details)

Product Description

A Good Walk Starts with Comfort—for Both You and Your Dog!

Waldsmuller No Pull Adjustable Dog Harness and Leash Set – Designed for Your Dog, and You.

Enjoying a walk in the park with your dog obediently at your heels is a dream activity of many pet owners. It is very convenient and safe for dogs to have a comfortable no pull vest harness and leash combination.

Dog Harness + Leash Set

Dog Leash

The dog harness has different size and color can be selected,Harness is equipped with a traction rope of the black color, A comfortable cushion cotton is added to the handshaking part of the traction rope.Prevent the hand from being injured due to excessive tension. It is convenient, beautiful and comfortable. No Pull Dog Harness

Our non-pulling dog harness is specially designed with 2 metal D shape clip for safer dog walks.The harness for dogs is made with a soft, breathable air mesh, which is high-density, soft and comfortable, and can prevent chewing or tearing. This lightweight dog harness is perfect for walks all year round.

What you will get: 1 X Dog harness 1 X Dog Leash 1 X Dog Collar

Comfort Padded Handle

Special foam padded handle design gives you a more comfortable grip than ever, protecting your hands from rope burn even your dog pulls. O-ring on the handle allows you to easily attach a waste bag or keys.

More Durable, Much Safer

This heavy duty dog leash is made ofstronger than other rock climbing rope which is reinforced with durable woven design. Sturdy enough for medium dogs.

360° Swivel Clasp

360 degree tangle free swivel heavy duty clasp gives your dog best freedom.Say “no” to the rope twining during outdoor walking, hiking, playing with your dog.

High Quality Reflective Rope

When walking your dog at night, visibility is key to the safety of you and your dog. Highly reflective threads keep high visibility at night for safety.

Please refer to this size chart,there may be 0-3cm diggerence in measurement data,please measure your dog before purchasing or inquiry us !

for pets

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 7, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Waldseemüller
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B5Q9F7X1

Comfy Padded Handle: Our dog harness has a soft handle on the top of the harness, The handle is made of a soft sponge, comfortable and firm, It can restrain dogs easily and is also perfect for walking them up steps, stairs, and cars, etc. You can grab it quickly and keep control of your dog when they go crazy or when they need help.
Standard Leash: The 5ft dog leash is reinforced with a durable woven design, Special foam padded handle design gives you a more comfortable grip than ever, protecting your hands from rope burn even your dog pulls. The O-ring on the leash handle allows you to easily attach a trash bag or keys.
Reflective Design for Night Safety: When walking your dog after dinner, visibility is key to the safety of you and your dog. There are reflective strips on the dog harness and leash, which can increase visibility at night and pre-dawn hours to keep your dog safe.
Attention: Sizing does NOT directly correspond to your pet’s breed or weight. Please MEASURE your pet by size guide which has a measuring tape and refer to our sizing chart for the best fit before ordering, If you need help, please feel free to contact us, our service team will always help you!

A Good Walk Starts with Comfort—for Both You and Your Dog!

Waldsmuller No Pull Adjustable Dog Harness and Leash Set – Designed for Your Dog, and You.

Enjoying a walk in the park with your dog obediently at your heels is a dream activity of many pet owners. It is very convenient and safe for dogs to have a comfortable no pull vest harness and leash combination.

  • The dog harness has different size and color can be selected,
  • Harness is equipped with a traction rope of the black color,
  • A comfortable cushion cotton is added to the handshaking part of the traction rope.
  • Prevent the hand from being injured due to excessive tension.
  • It is convenient, beautiful and comfortable.

  • Our non-pulling dog harness is specially designed with 2 metal D shape clip for safer dog walks.
  • The harness for dogs is made with a soft, breathable air mesh, which is high-density, soft and comfortable, and can prevent chewing or tearing.
  • This lightweight dog harness is perfect for walks all year round.

What you will get:

  • 1 X Dog harness
  • 1 X Dog Leash
  • 1 X Dog Collar

Product Description

Hear Rate Monitoring

Android smart watch with the latest built-in heart rate sensor, can effectively accurate measure your heart rate. Meaning you can know of pulse rate changes in real time.

Blood oxygen and pressure monitoring

Digital watch with the latest built-in sensor, you can measure Blood Pressure and see how much oxygen is in your blood. Check your health status at any time.

Music Control

Find and turn on music controls in your fitness watch for quick and easy control of your music (play/pause, next/previous song) during training sessions.

Sleep Quality Monitoring

The mans womens smart watch can automatically monitor and analyze your sleep quality in real time 24 hours a day, and accurately monitor the sleep situation for nearly 7 days.

Customize You Watch Face

1.69″ touch touchscreen, you can customize the watch face to enjoy a variety of cool watch faces. You can even customize the watch face based on your own photos or favorite pictures.

IP68 Waterproof

Waterproof watch is an IP68 waterproof standard, You can wear it while washing your hands or in the shower, or even while swimming.

Call and Mesaages Notificatio: Smart watch for android phones will vibrate to remind you when your smartphone receives call notification, SMS and APP messages (WhatsAPP, Facebook, Messenger, Instagram) so you don’t miss every message.
1.69 Inch Full Touch Screen: This smart watch for android compatible features a 1.69 inch TFT-LCD color display for outstanding HD quality. Zinc alloy case and silicone strap, make you more comfortable to wear. You can choose from140 + personalized watch faces, or set your favorite photo from your phone as a watch face.
24 Hours Health Monitoring: This smart watch for man women features real-time heart rate monitoring, blood pressure monitoring, blood oxygen monitoring, exercise recording and sleep monitoring, accurately records all-day activities such as steps, calories burned a fitness watch to monitor your health at all times.
IP68 Waterproof: This activity trackers and smartwatche is designed with IP68 waterproof rating, so you can have no worries when washing your hands or swimming in the pool.At the same time, this fitness trackers for women man has 8 sports modes include walking, running. cycling, skipping, badminton, basketball, football, swimming.
